downloadTitle: Scaling Applications Using Windows Azure Cloud Services Poster
downloadDescription: Depicts the phases for scaling an application using Windows Azure Cloud Services including designing, deploying, and tuning.
detailsSection:
Describes the benefits of using Cloud Services to scale applications for architects and developers. Depicts the scale-out process in three phases:

  1. Plan and Design for optimal performance using specific patterns and practices.
  2. Build and Deploy worker and web instances and their support services as a scale unit that can be easily duplicated and deployed.
  3. Run and Tune the processes that refine the application and enable scale-out.


Note: If you open the .pdf file in Adobe Acrobat reader, you can click different sections of the poster to link to additional relevant information.
installInstructionSection: The poster is intended to be printed and measures 26” x 39”.
